Spain to impose sanctions on violent Israeli settlers if no EU dealSpain will impose sanctions on violent Israeli settlers in the West Bank unilaterally if its European Union partners fail to reach an agreement on the issue, Foreign Minister Jose Manuel Albares said on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 13:07:52 GMT MU6CZMV5TZIJZMPASYKBTMIWDI https://www.reuters.com/world/spain-impose-sanctions-violent-israeli-settlers-if-no-eu-deal-2024-02-19/Reuters世界
Dutch nationalist Wilders lashes out against Ukrainian refugeesDutch far right leader Geert Wilders, who won the most seats in an election three months ago but has so far failed to form a new coalition government, said on Monday the Netherlands was "Europe's fool" for accepting too many Ukrainian refugees. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 13:02:32 GMT 7XX3B4RQ3NP23IXO65Y3XAQPLE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/dutch-nationalist-wilders-lashes-out-against-ukrainian-refugees-2024-02-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Strike closes Eiffel Tower in blow to tourists ahead of Paris OlympicsThe Eiffel Tower, one of the most visited tourist sites in the world, closed on Monday as staff went on strike in protest against the way the Paris monument is managed financially, disappointing the crowds below. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 12:58:34 GMT KRHZKHUKZVOPRCKZTKAYOB2NYU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/strike-closes-eiffel-tower-blow-tourists-ahead-paris-olympics-2024-02-19/Reuters商业工作世界
UN to explore appointment of envoy to engage Taliban with international communityThe United Nations secretary general will begin consultations on the appointment of a U.N. envoy to coordinate engagement between Afghanistan's Taliban government and the international community, he said on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 12:44:43 GMT 4OQMQHBUWRILPP5X4VSBWKDW7E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/un-explore-appointment-envoy-engage-taliban-with-international-community-2024-02-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
Ukrainian President Zelenskiy visits northeastern front lineUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy visited the northeastern sector of the front linewhere he met troops fighting against invading Russian forces, his office reported on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 12:41:33 GMT 4DHL5PIL25CRXOZTO3Z4JCCE2U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-president-zelensky-visits-northeastern-front-line-2024-02-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Parole for Thailand's Thaksin reflects rise of new threat to old guardThe early release of Thailand's once-fugitive ex-Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra represents to many a deal the influential billionaire made with his enemies to counter an even greater threat to the royalist-military establishment. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 12:37:47 GMT WBR2XSWIJBMTXILGUSM2FXL5I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/parole-thailand-thaksin-reflects-rise-new-threat-old-guard-2024-02-19/Panu Wongcha-Um, Kay Johnson世界亚太地区
Exclusive: Turkish-Russian trade hit by fresh US sanctions threatA U.S. threat to hit financial firms doing business with Russia with sanctions has chilled Turkish-Russian trade, disrupting or slowing some payments for both imported oil and Turkish exports, according to seven sources familiar with the matter. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 12:32:16 GMT ZK3X3G7YUNMSHH2ULPOLYWTM2M https://www.reuters.com/markets/turkish- Russian-trade-hit-by-fresh-us-sanctions-threat-2024-02-19/Can Sezer, Nevzat Devranoglu, Dmitry Zhdannikov市场
Russia says Ukraine poisoned governors of two annexed Ukrainian provincesRussia's Defence Ministry said on Monday that Ukraine poisoned the Moscow-installed governors of Ukraine's Kherson and Luhansk regions, though both were still alive. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 12:22:12 GMT 3XWX4ARZNFP6HCE227S3UDEF https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-ukraine-poisoned-governors-two-annexed-ukrainian-provinces-2024-02-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Pakistan's Imran Khan-backed candidates to join Sunni party -interim party chiefIndependent candidates backed by Pakistan’s jailed former prime minister that won seats in inconclusive elections over 10 days ago will join the minority Sunni Ittehad Council Political Party to form a government, the party's interim chief said on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 12:11:34 GMT 6QL4S4HJXJMAXPIIGCEDK2BFHE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistan-imran-khan-backed-candidates-join-sunni-party-interim-party-chief-2024-02-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
Swedish PM looking forward to meeting Hungary's Orban as NATO ratification beckonsSwedish Prime Minister Ulf Kristersson said on Monday that he looked forward to meeting his Hungarian counterpart Viktor Orban and to Sweden becoming member of NATO, following signals that the Hungary could ratify Sweden's application this month. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 12:09:14 GMT 4GWYUSMLAJKNBCSDTRNKRHCHWM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/swedish-pm-looking-forward-meeting-hungary-orban-nato-ratification-beckons-2024-02-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Israel to set security limits on Ramadan prayers at Jerusalem's Al Aqsa, Netanyahu saysIsraeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Monday that he had made a "balanced decision" to allow freedom of worship at Jerusalem's Al Aqsa mosque during Ramadan, but that access would be limited according to security needs. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 11:57:12 GMT 4MLYFLI7UBOMLEHHYHUKCTNZN4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-sets-security-limits-ramadan-prayers-jerusalem-al-aqsa-netanyahu-says-2024-02-19/Reuters世界中东地区
